children.text: There has not been an earth rod installed into the reinforcement.
The relevant Australian Standard AS 3000 Wiring Rules states in section 5.6.2.5 that
‘Any conductive reinforcing within a concrete floor or wall forming part of a shower or bathroom shall be bonded to the earthing system of the electrical installation’ .
An earthing bonding conductor will need properly installed prior to any concrete being poured.
